author: Nick Timiraos
title: Jeff Flake says he hasn’t ruled out running against Trump in 2020 - MarketWatch
text:
Sen. Jeff Flake (R., Ariz.), a frequent critic of President Donald Trump, said he hoped a Republican would run for president against Mr. Trump in 2020 and that he hadn’t ruled out a primary challenge of his own.
“It’s not in my plans, but I have not ruled anything out,” Mr. Flake said Sunday on NBC’s “Meet the Press”.
